alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Union County; Upper Rio Grande Valley; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 30 at 1:25AM MDT until September 30 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Upper Rio Grande Valley, Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, Union County, Chuska Mountains, and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Union County; Upper Rio Grande Valley; West Central Plateau
